data.name: AL0001AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Prohibit reassignment of primary constructor parameters

data.name: AL0001AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Primary constructor parameter '{0}' should not be reassigned

data.name: AL0001AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Primary constructor parameters should not be reassigned as this can lead to confusion and bugs.

data.name: AL0002AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Don't repeat negated patterns

data.name: AL0002AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Use 'not' only once or not at all

data.name: AL0002AnalyzerDescription
data.value: The negated pattern should not be repeated multiple times.

data.name: AL0003AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Don't divide by constant zero

data.name: AL0003AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Division by constant zero will throw DivideByZeroException

data.name: AL0003AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Integers and Decimal should never be divided by the constant 0 as this causes a DivideByZeroException at runtime.

data.name: AL0004AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Use pattern matching when comparing Span with constants

data.name: AL0004AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Use pattern matching instead of equality operators for Span comparison

data.name: AL0004AnalyzerDescription
data.value: When comparing Span and a constant, use pattern matching instead of equality operators, unless you want to compare addresses.

data.name: AL0005AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Use SequenceEqual when comparing Span with non-constants

data.name: AL0005AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Use SequenceEqual instead of equality operators for Span comparison

data.name: AL0005AnalyzerDescription
data.value: When comparing Span and a non-constant, use SequenceEqual instead of equality operators, unless you want to compare addresses.

data.name: AL0006AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Field name conflicts with primary constructor parameter

data.name: AL0006AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Field '{0}' conflicts with a primary constructor parameter

data.name: AL0006AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Field names should not conflict with primary constructor parameters to avoid shadowing and confusion.

data.name: AL0007AnalyzerTitle
data.value: GetSchema should be explicitly implemented

data.name: AL0007AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: IXmlSerializable.GetSchema should be explicitly implemented

data.name: AL0007AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Implement IXmlSerializable.GetSchema explicitly to avoid exposing it as part of the public API.

data.name: AL0008AnalyzerTitle
data.value: GetSchema must return null and not be abstract

data.name: AL0008AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: IXmlSerializable.GetSchema should return null and not be abstract

data.name: AL0008AnalyzerDescription
data.value: GetSchema should return null according to IXmlSerializable guidance and should not be abstract.

data.name: AL0009AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Don't call IXmlSerializable.GetSchema

data.name: AL0009AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Don't call IXmlSerializable.GetSchema

data.name: AL0009AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Calling GetSchema is not supported; it should always return null and isn't intended to be invoked.

data.name: AL0010AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Type should be partial

data.name: AL0010AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: The type '{0}' should be partial for source generator support

data.name: AL0010AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Types that are targets for source generators should be marked as partial.

data.name: AL0011AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Avoid lock keyword on non-Lock types

data.name: AL0011AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Use 'Lock _lock = new()' with 'lock(_lock)' instead of 'lock(object)'. The Lock class provides better performance in .NET 9+.

data.name: AL0011AnalyzerDescription
data.value: The lock keyword on object/non-Lock types should be replaced with the Lock class from System.Threading.

data.name: AL0012AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Deprecated semantic convention attribute

data.name: AL0012AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: '{0}' is deprecated since schema v{1}. Use '{2}' instead.

data.name: AL0012AnalyzerDescription
data.value: This attribute name has been deprecated in the OpenTelemetry semantic conventions.

data.name: AL0013AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Missing telemetry schema URL

data.name: AL0013AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: OpenTelemetry resource configuration should include 'telemetry.schema_url' attribute

data.name: AL0013AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Setting the schema URL allows collectors and backends to understand which version of semantic conventions your telemetry uses.
